biotools.summary: Deepred-Mt is a novel method to predict C-to-U editing sites in angiosperm mitochondrial RNA. Given an RNA sequence consisting of a central cytidine flanked by 20 nucleotides on each side, Deepred-Mt scores if the central cytidine is edited.

bioschemas.name: Deepred-Mt
bioschemas.summary: Deepred-Mt is a novel method to predict C-to-U editing sites in angiosperm mitochondrial RNA. Given an RNA sequence consisting of a central cytidine flanked by 20 nucleotides on each side, Deepred-Mt scores if the central cytidine is edited.
